Body:
I'm no linguistics expert but the sound "oong" in the North is pronounced like "on" in Southern dialect. In the South they are both pronounced the same.

For example the word "đoòng" above is pronounced as "đòn" in Southern Vietnam. Some other common words for this are "xoong nồi" (pot for cooking), "boong tàu" (ship deck), "xe goòng" (wagon).
